name: Release v3.8.2
body: Fix for v3.8.1 for locales to be for NVIDIA shop.

name: URL Updates for Locales
body: URL Updates for locales from 3.8 release, should work in all regions now not just USA.

name: Release v3.8
body: NVIDIA made changes to their API that stop auto checkout addition, this release restores basic functionality for opening a browser and sending a link to the proper product page for releases (notifications of drops still work)

name: 32 Bit ARM
body: This release adds 32 bit ARM support back in, nothing else major.

name: Additional Product Code Support
body: Adds support for a variety of new regions, removes the need for the -test flag (simply use -model=2060 in existing regions to validate)

name: CAN Store Fixes
body: Fixes for CAN store.

name: Desktop Notifications
body: This release adds support for system native desktop notifications, add the -desktop flag when you run clerk to turn them on.

name: IMPORTANT - 3090 FE Region Support
body: Adds in support for 3090 FEs in all regions but Portugal. YAY!

name: Telegram Fixes
body: Implements fixes for Telegram notifications (verified functionality including link support)

name: IOS Link Fixes + ARM v5+ Support Fix
body:
Updated default version for ARM to be v5 it should be forward compatible with future ARM versions.

Also escaped the URL for mobile devices to avoid IOS automatically trying to inspect the link and it failing.

name: ARM Support Linux/Windows
body: This release adds support for Linux based 32 bit and 64 bit ARM systems (RaspberryPI, ETC) and also Surface (Windows ARM) tablets/systems.

name: Telegram Fixes
body: Fixes linking for telegram by disabling link previewing.

name: Discord Fixes
body: Discord fixes tested (discord was crawling the links to the store and taking our GPUs away!)

name: Broken
body: Please use previous release

name: 3.1 - Minor Fixes
body: Adds support for automatic checkout see README for new usage with and without -remote

name: v3.0 - Automatic Add To Checkout
body: Adds support for automatic checkout see README for new usage with and without -remote

name: Better Notifications and Testing
body: This release updates all the test and notifications to include links to the cart so you can run this code while away form your computer if you want.

name: Browser Support + Delay
body: This release removes the dependency on chrome (it opts to use your default system browser) and also re-enables support for optional delay to be added to requests

name: Fixes for bad response from NVIDIA
body: Fixes for bad response's from NVIDIA that don't have proper error codes.

name: NEW 3090 Support USA/GBR Only
body: 3090 Support for USA and GBR is added in this release using the -model flag, we need SKU's for other regions still and they're hard to come by.

name: Fixes for Nvidia New Store Changes
body: NVIDIA made substantial improvements to their API security to prevent botting (nice job guys!), this release removes the features to add the card to your cart automatically. What is in tact is notifications, it will notify you and open a browser on the page where the add to cart button is.

name: IMPORTANT - 3070/3090 Support
body:
Big release here, I've added support for 3070/3090's when they launch.

You can setup the bot prior to launch by entering the model number you want to secure. There are various other improvements as well including more robust logging (including model names again yay) and error checking.

name: Important BugFixes
body: Important bug fixes for those that are receiving stalls after some period of time

name: Telegram Fixes
body: Release includes fixes for telegram users.

name: Telegram Notifications and Manual Delay Control
body: Added support for Telegram Notifications and Manually Specifying your delay. Please see update README.md for usage instructions.

name: Important Retry Logic
body: Adding in new retry logic for different failure cases related to cart/checkout (and a fix for inventory status to not fail when erroring out)

name: Netherlands Support
body: Release adds support for NLD region as well as date time stamp logging in console output.

name: Release v1.3
body: Minor release, added a parameter to every request to ensure responses don't get cached (this shouldn't be an issue to begin with but just to be safe)

name: Release v1.2
body: Adds regional support for Norway

name: Release v1.1
body:
Big Release Here

Simplified usage a TON, but now we only support the list of supported regions (cut an issue if you're region isn't listed there)

Please view new readme and make sure to take this update as it's faster and more stable.

name: Discord and Twitter Notification Support
body: Latest official release includes Discord and Twitter notification support!

name: Sweden Support
body: Add Sweden as a supported SKU, see updated README.md for usage instructions and SKU value.

name: Logging Improvements
body: Improvements for error message handling to reduce user concern when rate limiting occurs.

name: Automated Regional Configuration and Google Chrome Paths
body:
This release adds two major features,

The first is users from regions listed in the SKU section will no longer need to set NVIDIA_CLERK_LOCALE and NVIDIA_CLERK_CURRENCY environmental variables. The regions listed in the SKU section will be updated as we find more SKUs, in the mean time please open an issue if you don't see your region listed there.

The second is support for Google Chrome installs in AppData.

name: Global Locale and Currency Support
body: This latest release should help out folks not located in the USA. I don't currently have the SKU's for every country so someone will have to find those to get this working. Please see the readme for instructions on setting your Locale and Currency (US folks don't need to change usage at all)

name: Latest - Updated Twilio
body: Updated Twilio usage instructions and added a -test flag when combined with -sms you can manually validate your twilio config without needing to run the full application.

name: Initial Release
body:
Latest release please see README.md in repository for usage instructions, be sure you download the appropriate executable for your operating system (Darwin is Mac).

Updated to work after NVIDIA's removal of QuickCheckout.

Updated to support multiple locations for Google Chrome installs, as well as fixing Mac chrome app opening.
